name: Banking for All
title: Universal Financial Access
description: In 2021, Austria achieved a remarkable feat with 100% of its poorest 40% of the population having access to financial institutions or mobile money services, showcasing its commitment to financial inclusivity.

name: Safe and Secure
title: Minimal Business Losses from Crime
description: Austrian firms reported only 0.5% of annual sales lost to theft and vandalism in 2021, highlighting the country's effective security measures and stable business environment.

name: On Time, Every Time
title: Efficient Logistics Performance
description: With a logistics performance index score of 4.3 in 2022, Austria excels in ensuring shipments reach their destinations on schedule, reflecting its robust infrastructure and efficient supply chain management.

name: Safe Motherhood
title: Lowest Maternal Mortality
description: Austria recorded an impressively low maternal mortality ratio of 1 per 100,000 live births in 2017, underscoring its advanced healthcare system and commitment to maternal health.
